DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate pathologic complete response rate pre-operative concurrent chemoradiotherapy capecitabine plus irinotecan resectable rectal cancer
DOC.brief_title: Preoperative Chemoradiotherapy With Capecitabine Plus Irinotecan Rectal Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: This study open-label , single center , nonrandomized phase II study . Daily fraction radiotherapy 1.8 Gy total 45 Gy tumor drain lymph node follow coned-down boost 5.4 Gy tumor deliver concurrently chemotherapy . Chemotherapy start day 1 radiotherapy . Capecitabine administer orally dose 825 mg/m2 twice daily weekday ( Monday Friday ) every week radiotherapy . Irinotecan 40 mg/m2 give intravenously week ( D 1 , 8 , 15 , 22 & 29 ) . Six Â± 2 week completion chemoradiotherapy , curative surgery perform . Post-operative chemotherapy capecitabine give patient 3-6 week surgery . Capecitabine 1,250 mg/m2 twice daily day 1-14 every 21 day administer 18 week .
